snippet: A 10-room penthouse on the 14th and 15th floors of 1045 Fifth Avenue is poised to enter the market for the first time ever.
abstract: Two-story penthouse at 1045 Fifth Avenue enters market for first time since construction of the building in 1966; asking price for the apartment, which offers 40-foot vistas across Central Park's reservoir, is $15.5 million.
lead_paragraph: A 10-room penthouse on the 14th and 15th floors of 1045 Fifth Avenue is poised to enter the market for the first time ever.

headline.seo: Fifth Avenue Penthouse With Central Park Views
